list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a relationship between two things or situations, especially where one thing affects the other.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: investigating a link between pollution and forest decline
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: điều tra một liên kết giữa ô nhiễm và suy giảm rừng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a ring or loop in a chain.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a chain made of steel links
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một chuỗi làm bằng thép liên kết

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a torch of pitch and tow for lighting the way in dark streets.
make, form, or suggest a connection with or between.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: rumors that linked his name with Judith
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tin đồn liên kết tên của mình với Judith
